author: KarolWes
title: Not so bad addition
review:
This small polybag is an addition to April issue of Star Wars Magazine.

Model

So I'm truly disappointed. This model is just ugly. In overall look remind the U-wing we can see in Rogue One, especially, when it has unfolded wing. But it is too wide, too short and doesn't have crew compartment. Engine section looks good. Worst part is nose part. It missing a lot, and isn't tiled, which makes it look odd and weird. Guns at front are good enough. Colors are nice, pretty much the same as on original.

Wings can folded back - nice feature. 

Model is very stable, durable.

Construction

Easy, straightforward, little usage jumper to make half-stud space. Engines attached at the side.

Parts

There are 37 parts in here. Mostly white. Some of them are really great - for example very new type of tile with plate attached on a side. There are also some wing parts, curved bricks (also inverted), new rounded 1x2, three half tiles. There are also 1x3 with 2 studs in light yellow.

Summary

  • Model looks poor and ugly
  • Worst u-wing Lego've ever made
  • Folded wings looks and work good
  • Parts are great, especially lot of new ones
  • Price - good enough - ~3$
